issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.description: Currently, without {{hive.driver.parallel.compilation}} introduced in HIVE-4239, only one SQL operation can enter the compilation block per HS2 instance, and all the rest will be blocked. We should add metrics info for the number of operations that are blocked.
fields.summary: Add Metrics for the number of Hive operations waiting for compile

comments.body: Patch looks good to me, but it's good if [~jxiang] can also take a look.
